formula: a(n)=2*sum(k=1..n, sum(j=0..(n-k)/2, binomial(n,n-k-2*j)*(k^(n-k-2*j)*sum(i=0..k/2, (2*i-k)^(k+2*j)*binomial(k,i)*(-1)^(k+j-i))))/(2^k*k!)), n>0, a(0)=1. [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 13 2011]
mathematica: Array[ SeriesCoefficient[ Series[ Exp[ Sin[ x ]*Exp[ x ] ], {x, 0, 30} ], # ]*#!&, 29, 0 ]
author: _R. H. Hardin_
